Package com.irurueta.server.commons.image

Class ImageReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.irurueta.server.commons.image.ImageReader
  • public class ImageReader
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to read image metadata.

      • readImage

        public ImageReaderResult readImage​(java.io.File f)
                            throws InvalidImageException,
                                   java.io.IOException
        Reads image metadata from provided image file.
        Parameters:
        f - file containing an image in one of the supported formats (jpg, png, gif or bmp).
        Returns:
        result containing image metadata and image file information.
        Throws:
        InvalidImageException - throws if file is corrupted, contains invalid data, is not an image or format is not supported.
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs.

      • checkValidFile

        public static boolean checkValidFile​(java.io.File f)
                              throws InvalidImageException,
                                     java.io.IOException
        Check if valid is one of the supported image formats.
        Parameters:
        f - an image file.
        Returns:
        true if file appears to be valid, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        InvalidImageException - if image file is corrupted.
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs.

      • computeCRCandMd5

        private void computeCRCandMd5​(java.io.File f,
                              ImageReaderResult result)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Computes CRC and MD5 hashes for provided file and the results get stored in provided result instance.
        Parameters:
        f - file to compute CRC and MD5 hashes.
        result - instance where CRC and MD5 will be stored.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs.

      • getImageFormat

        private ImageFormat getImageFormat​(org.apache.commons.imaging.ImageInfo imageInfo)
        Determines image format for a given image file.
        Parameters:
        imageInfo - structure containing metadata of image file being read.
        Returns:
        detected image format.

      • internalCheckValid

        private static boolean internalCheckValid​(org.apache.commons.imaging.ImageInfo imageInfo)
        Indicates if image file corresponds to one of the supported image formats.
        Parameters:
        imageInfo - structure containing metadata of image file being read.
        Returns:
        if image file has one of the supported formats.

      • internalReadExif

        private void internalReadExif​(java.io.File f,
                              org.apache.commons.imaging.ImageInfo imageInfo,
                              ImageMetadata result)
                       throws InvalidImageException,
                              java.io.IOException
        Internal method in charge of reading image metadata and EXIF tags.
        Parameters:
        f - image file.
        imageInfo - structure containing metadata of image file being read.
        result - structure where resulting image metadata will be stored.
        Throws:
        InvalidImageException - if image file is corrupted or not supported.
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
